name: Thinking Storm Challenge
description:
Welcome to the Thinking Challenge Storm! This is a question answering game developed based on the Unity game engine, bringing you endless intellectual challenges and fun. Appropriate answers hidden in each level. The game is divided into 16 levels, each with exciting music. In the game, you will face various brain tests, covering multiple fields such as mathematics and logic. When wisdom meets a challenge, a mind challenge storm is born! This exciting question answering game will test your brain and mental agility. In the game, you will face various interesting questions, from ordinary knowledge to brain riddles, all presented in this storm.
In the game, our beautiful women will welcome the intelligent challengers, who are representative characters of the game and will be featured as titles in the game. Beauty has a unique style and personality, engaging in interesting interactions with you and adding charm to the game

Game features

16 thrilling levels: Each level has unique questions and puzzles for you to experience extraordinary challenges.
Stimulating Imagination: The game's unconventional question setting will stimulate your imagination and unconventional thinking, allowing you to have fun during the thinking process.
Exciting Music: Each level has built-in exciting music, allowing you to experience the ultimate gaming experience while challenging.
Gameplay:
Choose levels: After entering the game, you can choose any of the 16 levels to start your mind burst journey.
Exploring problems: Each level will give you a puzzle to read and think about solutions.
By quickly responding and providing accurate answers in the game, you will challenge the depth and breadth of your knowledge.
Through playing, I believe you can become a true master of thinking.
Thinking Challenge Storm is not only a game, but also a stage to showcase wisdom. May you explore the ocean of thinking and unlock new realms of wisdom in 'Thinking Challenge Storm'. Show your talent in the game, challenge various questions, and let your brain shine in this storm! Show the world your unparalleled thinking power! Are you ready? The challenge is about to begin!
